string.name: name
string.value: A Fifth Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lv. 100, #p9010010# starts talking to you...
#p9010010#, in a sincere voice, congratulates you for reaching Lv. 100 and asks that you come see her so that she can give you the final scroll. Go to town and meet with #p9010010#.
You received a scroll from #p9010010#. #p9010010# says that she has given you everything she could and that all that is left is for you to work hard and believe in yourself.

Wow... You really did it, Evan. You really reached Lv. 100! Truth is, I didn't actually think you were going to do it... Luckily, I have one more scroll prepared for you anyway. Come find me in #btown#k.
Hmm... You refuse? Please rethink your decision.
Although I've been encouraging you and cheering you on, I really didn't think you were going to do it this time. But you did it! Although I was mistaken about you, I don't feel bad at all.
This is the last scroll that I've prepared for you. I really didn't think I would be giving you this. Hehehe, you really are amazing!
I've given you everything that I could. What's left is for you to do on your own. But I'm not worried. From what I've seen you do so far, I know that you will only get better and better!
